title: Augmented Reality-Based Elementary English Vocabulary Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of basic English alphabet and proficiency in 100 everyday vocabulary words
context.additional_context: Blended learning using tablets/smartphones in BYOD environments: twice-weekly face-to-face classes (40 minutes) + daily 15-minute AR self-directed learning

learning_goals: Manipulate 3D objects in an AR environment and utilize 25 new vocabulary words per week in contextually appropriate ways
Complete word meaning-pronunciation-spelling-image associations with 80% accuracy through an augmented reality quiz system
Generate over 10 situational expression sentences by sharing AR word maps with peers in collaborative learning mode

resources: Vocabulary curriculum mapping document for teachers
AR marker kit for students (printable materials)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
